name: Horace Hagfish
description:
Launch yourself into a puzzle-filled gauntlet as Horace Hagfish. Your expertise in slime production and love for meat make you the perfect candidate to recover the colors of the cosmos. Consume different colored meat to generate colored slime trails, blend colors to shift hues, and collect colored orbs to unlock the exit. Remember to be mindful of your mixing, as creating brown is game over for both you and the universe.


Eat meat to create colored slime trails. Blend colors by crossing trails!


Whatever you do, don't make brown!



  • Experience 50 levels that will push your wits to the limit.
  • A cornucopia of innovative puzzle elements.
  • Glorious 16-color EGA graphics!
  • If you find yourself stuck, a progressive hint system will guide you in the right direction.


Three optional hints per level will keep the brown at bay!



Monochromulus has broken free of the CGA nebula and extended his Proboscis-Umbilicus toward the peaceful planet of EGA…
With a suction, only pure evil can muster, Monochromulus sucks up the color orbs and delicious meats of EGA. For he loathes the vibrant colors of the cosmos and intends to mix them all together and cover the universe in brown techno gravy. Only you can save the universe from a monochromatic gravy drenched future!
